metadata.description:
加密艺术家CryptoZR发布的新作品「100天」
 参与者将面对人性考验，在超额收益和社区信誉两者之中做出选择。作品由80人每人注入1枚ETH进入资金池，总计80枚ETH，任何参与者均可在100天内的任意时间提取池内已解锁的资金，每天解锁0.8枚ETH并持续累积
 艺术家将还原一个最真实的试验场，将参与者的行为和真实发生在参与者行为中的故事作为艺术创作的素材
 
 The new work 100 Days released by artist CryptoZR
 The Participants will face the test of morality, choose between substantial income and community reputation. The project is funded by 80 community members with a total of 80 ETH, which will be put into a prize pool. Any participant can withdraw the unlocked funds in this pool at any time within 100 days, unlock 0.8 ETH every day
 CryptoZR will using the behavior of the participants and the stories that actually happened in the behavior of the participants as the material of artistic creation
metadata.name: 100 Days
